document_data.mainbody:
Beef and Oysters Barnabus was a dish known in Faer√ªn in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Combined with wild rice,
In Eleint of the , in Ghars in Cormyr, Barthelm Meadowbrock planned to have Beef and Oysters Barnabas for the welcoming dinner at the Sheaf of Wheat inn for the upcoming Grand Council of the Merchants Guild. He ordered a butt of Westgate Ruby from Shortshanks of the Bold Bard tavern, swearing it was the only wine to have with Beef and Oysters Barnabas.
At the dinner on Eleint 19, it was the most popular dish on offer, with the councilmen queuing up and coming back for more, though this was mostly due to the beautiful Mayella Meadowbrock doing the serving. Even Jasper had seconds, despite hating oysters.
